attributes.additional_details: I come to this site nearly everyday although  there’s people out there that can only use this recycling centre on the days they are not busy which could be the days it is opened/closed which I think isn’t fair due to them paying there council tax . There are 7 of us in our household and the bin collections aren’t regular enough so this site staying open 7 days a week helps with that ,everytime I go there it is busy so on the days it is opened only going to bring on environmental problems .Falkirk council budget cuts that’s all it is. From using this place regular I know there are about 7 to 10  supervisors the council wonder why they struggle for a budget.
attributes.background: Roughmute Recycling Centre and Kinneil Recycling Centre inside the Falkirk district  which is opened 7 days a week from 9am to 6pm Monday to Sunday.The SNP have agreed for the two Recycling centres to be only open 5 days a week which I think could cause environmental problems.
